name: Solitaire (Classic Klondike)
description:
THE most ORIGINAL solitaire game is here!

The classic card game you've played, klondike, are now available on mobile, free and offline!

The game rule is simple and be same as before:
Move all Cards to the Foundations

The difference is that all deals are winnable, although sometimes it's not easy, but that's what makes the game so much fun!

Features of Solitaire Legend：

• Totally free! You can fully enjoy it without spending real money
• Offline game! you can enjoy it anywhere you want without wifi
• Single player card game, perfect for when you're on your own
• Brain game, it will exercises logical and observation effectively
• Relaxing game, no time limit, you can play it at your own pace
• Extensive customizable options make it something of your own
• Comprehensive statistics page to record the every breakthrough

Come on, try to challenge yourself in this ever-popular game now!
